reviews.text: There was a warm Lancashire welcome at this guest house and everything was exactly "as it said on the tin".
reviews.title: Surprising Facilities at this Guest House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were clean and functional and the room rate with breakfast represented very good value for money.
reviews.title: Smells of smoke!

reviews.text: Generally I prefer the anonymity of hotels to the more intimate atmosphere in guest houses but in this case I would have no hesitation in recommending this establishment to those looking for good value accomodation in the area.
reviews.title: Very unpleasant, stay away!
